name: 関戸剛
info:
• 简体中文名: 关户刚
  • 别名: Tsuyoshi Sekito
  • 别名: 関戸 剛
  • 别名: せきと つよし
  • 别名: Sekito Tsuyoshi
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1963年4月3日
  • 引用来源: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tsuyoshi_Sekito
detail: Tsuyoshi Sekito (関戸 剛 Sekito Tsuyoshi?, born April 3, 1963) is a Japanese video game composer, arranger, and musician who has been employed at Square Enix since 1995. As a composer, he is best known for scoring the video games Brave Fencer Musashi (1998) and The Last Remnant (2008). He also plays the guitar in the rock bands The Black Mages and The Star Onions; both groups arrange and perform compositions from the Final Fantasy series.
